article.title: Boeing Wins Additional Contract for F/A-18 Technical Publication Services
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Boeing Defence Australia, a wholly owned subsidiary of The Boeing Company, has been awarded a three-year contract worth $4.5 million Australian dollars to provide the Royal Australian Air Force (RAAF) with support for F/A-18 Hornet aircraft technical publications. Boeing Defence Australia has provided F/A-18 technical publication services including management, production of amendments and additional RAAF support tasks for the past five years.
